Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; on left, part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; on right, part of rosette with white dots and red stroke; exterior: Z band at rim between pairs of narrow bands; below, part of pendant roundel as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 262, no. 534)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0462) (phase 2)
